batchHops.notes: New American variety bred from Simcoe and Nugget. Mosaic offers a blend of earthy, floral, tropical and fruity characteristics that work excellently in a variety of different beer styles.
batchHops.name: Mosaic

batchYeasts.name: Safale American
batchYeasts.description: American ale yeast producing well balanced beers with low diacetyl and a very clean, crisp end palate. Forms a firm foam head and presents a very good ability to stay in suspension during fermentation.

notes.note: Added 1.97 grams Citra, 2.10 grams Centennial and 2.02 grams Mosaic pellet hops to the FV.

mash.name: 11 High fermentability plus mash out (70 min)

mashFermentables.name: Pale Ale Malt
mashFermentables.notes: BEST Pale Ale deepens the light “golden” color of top-fermented beers, creating a pleasant flavor. It forms an excellent enzyme-rich foundation for intensive colored beer styles. It is an excellent base malt for brewing many different styles of British Pale Ale as well as for brewing Kölsch beer.

mashFermentables.name: Carapils
mashFermentables.notes: As used in Pilsner, “Lagerbier”, alcohol-reduced Beer, Light Beer and Bock Beer amongst others at a rate of up to 10 %. Use for foam improvement, improved head retention, fuller body. The lightest of the crystal malts.
mashFermentables.usedIn: Pilsener, Light eer, Lagerbier, Bock Beer, Alcohol reduced Beer
